description: Troubleshooting, servicing and repairing the unit problem.
Discussing with customer to solve their problem.
Traveling to assigned place when task is required.
Maintain machine performance by daily/weekly maintenance.
Operate machinery according to job instruction.
Set up machine for operation to achieve quality control standard.
Repair / Re-construct PCB circuit and defect units.
Assist Engineer in developing new product.
Keep store clean and tidy at all times.
Assist customers to find what they need quickly
